items.text: Now let’s learn how to render a PDF Document in android app itself -
items.href: Rendering a PDF Document in Android Activity/Fragment (Using PdfRenderer) | by Chahat Jain | Medium

items.text: We will use android support library PdfRenderer (Added in API level 21).
items.href: Rendering a PDF Document in Android Activity/Fragment (Using PdfRenderer) | by Chahat Jain | Medium

items.text: PdfRenderer — This class enables rendering a PDF document.
items.href: Rendering a PDF Document in Android Activity/Fragment (Using PdfRenderer) | by Chahat Jain | Medium

items.text: If you want to render a PDF, you create a renderer and for every page you want to render, you open the page, render it, and close the page.
items.href: Rendering a PDF Document in Android Activity/Fragment (Using PdfRenderer) | by Chahat Jain | Medium

items.text: Concept : PdfRenderer will convert your PDF page into image and you can show it on ImageView.
items.href: Rendering a PDF Document in Android Activity/Fragment (Using PdfRenderer) | by Chahat Jain | Medium
